resources.string:
Network timeouts on Android 9 (Pie) using WiFi may be caused by Android kernel variable ip_no_pmtu_disc=1 combined with your router setup.

You can try setting up the router to use MTU size to 1492.

Alternatively, you can use this tool to set the value of ip_no_pmtu_disc to 0 (requires root access), valid until next reboot.
Root access is required for Set/Clear buttons to be enabled.
